title: e-fgs-c47003-16
text: PROJECT SUMMARY INFORMATION FORM Community Program:  6th Framework Program Program Sub-Field:  Thematic field name and abbreviation (eg.: Information Society Technologies -IST) Related Call:  Name of call to which project is submitted (eg.: IST Thematic Field 2 nd Call, FP62003-IST-2) Project Title:  Extended title and acronym of project– It would be better if description is written in parenthesis in Turkish Project Objective:  Briefly, with a few sentences, explain the overall objective Project Coordinator:  Dr. fdgd dfgs Coordinator fghfşhkfdgdgdfşkhfş., Germany institution name Number of partners in the project:  x Project Coordinator in the Institution:  Name and title of project responsible in the institution Basic Responsibilities of the Institution in the Project:  What other duties does you institution have in the project, present shortly in bullet points
